document_data.name: Swords of the Black Opal
document_data.mainbody: The '''Swords of the Black Opal''' was an all-female adventuring band from [[Tethyr]], active in the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: By the {{YearlinkName|1370}}, the Swords of the Black Opal were among several formidable groups that protected the [[Firedrake Shores]] area of Tethyr. There were rumors that the Black Opal were paid by some pirates to serve as shore "goods-guards." Travelers needed not worry about the Swords of the Black Opal or other bands unless they decided to despoil the Shores' natural beauty.
